alert.note: Alert for Gogebic; Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 1:40PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gogebic and Ontonagon Counties through 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/... At 139 PM EDT/1239 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms across portions of Ontonagon and Gogebic Counties, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...The strongest storms will be capable of wind gusts in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Gogebic and Ontonagon Counties, including the following locations... Thomaston, Trout Creek, Presque Isle Reservoir, Norwich and Pomeroy Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
